description: High-quality ice rink schedules selected via two-pass AI filtering plus static hard-coded links
filtering_notes: Second pass removed duplicates and selected best link per (location, month) combination where parent_page_link != schedule_link. Static schedules added for reliable links that never change.

schedules.reasoning: Direct PDF link labeled 'December Skate Calendar (PDF)' on the main Ice Arena page. This is the primary schedule document for December 2025 public skating and ice times.
Direct PDF link labeled 'January Skate Calendar (PDF)' on the main Ice Arena page. This is the primary schedule document for January 2026 public skating and ice times.
